item.name: Listings
item.description: Classified ads management with approval workflow, full CRUD operations, and soft deletes

request.description: Get paginated list of approved listings (public access)
request.name: List Approved Listings (Public)

response.name: Success Response - Approved Listings

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific listing
request.name: Get Listing Details (Public)

response.name: Success Response - Listing Details

formdata.value: Brand new iPhone 15 Pro Max 256GB Space Black

response.name: Success Response - Listing Created

formdata.value: Brand new iPhone 15 Pro Max 256GB Space Black

response.name: Validation Error
response.body:
{
    "success": false,
    "message": "Validation failed",
    "data": null,
    "errors": [
        "The name field is required",
        "The description field is required",
        "The category uuid field is required",
        "The city uuid field is required",
        "The district uuid field is required",
        "At least one image is required",
        "Maximum 5 images are allowed",
        "Each image must be jpeg, png, jpg, or webp format",
        "Each image size cannot exceed 2MB"
    ]
}
